item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Try making it say:

[code] if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullGuthanEquipped()) {
int chance = 0;
chance = misc.random(8);

if(chance == 3) {
playerLevel[3] += (hitDiff);
sendMessage(“You drain the enemies health!”);
stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
}
}[/code]

Altho there will still be a glitch that it will over-heal, making you have more HP than your max HP

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

My Guthan’s healing spec. doesn’t heal. The message “you have drain the ememies health” come’s up but it doesn’t heal!
I’m using Pimpscape
This is the Code

 if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullGuthanEquipped()) {
 int chance = 0;
 chance = misc.random(8);

   if(chance == 3) {
    playerLevel[3] += (hitDiff / 2);
    sendMessage("You drain the enemies health!");
    stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
 }
}

Read full topic
